projects.title: ShopApp
projects.description: A feature‑rich online store where users browse, search and purchase products. Built as a monorepo with separate client (React + MUI) and server (Strapi) packages.
frontend: Product catalog, details, cart, Stripe payments
backend: REST API with authentication and permissions
features: Browse by category; rich product pages

projects.title: Chart Dashboard — Advanced Analytics
projects.description: A modern, feature‑rich analytics dashboard built with Next.js 15, TypeScript, and cutting‑edge visualization libraries. This platform combines real‑time data visualization, interactive widgets, and a seamless UX across devices.
projects.status: In active development; new components and features are added continuously while existing functionality is refined and optimized.
keyFeatures: Advanced charts: Line, Bar, Radar, Chord, Sankey, Bubble
Real‑time performance metrics, timelines, and heatmaps
Spotify integration: search, play, playlists, favorites
Financial widgets: wallet, spending analytics, cards, timeline
Weather & maps: multi‑city forecasts, Mapbox, animations
Time & productivity: world clock, timer, calendar, timeline rings
Responsive design with PWA, dark/light themes, and animations
techStack: Recharts & D3.js, Mapbox GL JS, Three.js
WebSockets for live data; Framer Motion for animations
Spotify API, OpenWeatherMap, payment validation, geolocation
